channel.title: OSRS Perfect Server -> Divine-Reality
channel.description:
[CENTER]
[I]Divine-Reality[/I] is an OSRS Emulation which focuses on giving you, the community, what you want. Our suggestion board is the most favourite section on our forums because you guys make [I]Divine-Reality[/I] what it is, so we aim to give you the content that you desire. We have many unique features and we are one of the first servers to implement a fully working Iron Man system. We hope that you come join us but first let's take a look at some of our main and most creditable features accompanied with some media.
[B]Features[/b]
[ul][*]24/7 Uptime [*]Automatic Systems [*]Client updating system [*]Friendly Community Support [*]Bank Tabs [*]Music & Sounds [*]Slayer and Boss Kill tracker [*]Iron Man [*]Zulrah [*]Corporeal Beast [*]Market (shows recent trades) [*]Professional Forums [*]OSRS Data (Items, Maps, etc) [*]In-Game Security Systems [*]Better punishment systems for player security and safeguard [*]Kraken & Cave Kraken [*]Challenging Drop Tables [*]Fully Functioning Clan Chat System [*]Achievement System [*]Highscores for every gamemode [*]Dedicated development team [*]Hunter [*]Boss Pets [*]Resizable and Fullscreen Client [*]Multiple Settings to change your experience [*]Profile System for the client saving your characters [*]Teamspeak Client [*]Community & Staff hosted events [*]Extremely community orientated [*]Proper mob (NPC) mechanics [*]Smooth and solid gameplay [*]Player protection system [*]Free for all minigame [*]Bounty hunter[/ul]
[B]Media[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/w9xpqQh.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/LCMPdra.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/cRD1YT2.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ktzUfbd.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HQHVvQM.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/RCKNoTp.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/ZYvjjUT.png[/img]
We have plenty more to offer but we really couldn't explain it all to you in one-thread. We can only ask that you join and experience it first-hand. [url=http://divine-reality.net/]Home[/url] [url=http://divine-reality.net/lic/]Forums[/url] [url=http://divine-reality.net/market.php]Market[/url] [url=http://divine-reality.net/DR.jar]Download .jar[/url] [url=http://divine-reality.net/highscores.php]Highscores[/url] [url=http://divine-reality.net/vote2/]Vote[/url] [url=http://www.divine-reality.net/shop.php]Donate[/url]
Thanks for taking the time to read our advertisement thread, see you in-game ;)
[/CENTER][/QUOTE]

item.title: OSRS Perfect Server -> Divine-Reality
item.dc:creator: @saint22 saint22
item.description:
@saint22 wrote:

[CENTER]

Divine-Reality is an OSRS Emulation which focuses on giving you, the community, what you want. Our suggestion board is the most favourite section on our forums because you guys make Divine-Reality what it is, so we aim to give you the content that you desire. We have many unique features and we are one of the first servers to implement a fully working Iron Man system. We hope that you come join us but first let’s take a look at some of our main and most creditable features accompanied with some media.

Features

[ul][]24/7 Uptime
[]Automatic Systems
[]Client updating system
[]Friendly Community Support
[]Bank Tabs
[]Music & Sounds
[]Slayer and Boss Kill tracker
[]Iron Man
[]Zulrah
[]Corporeal Beast
[]Market (shows recent trades)
[]Professional Forums
[]OSRS Data (Items, Maps, etc)
[]In-Game Security Systems
[]Better punishment systems for player security and safeguard
[]Kraken & Cave Kraken
[]Challenging Drop Tables
[]Fully Functioning Clan Chat System
[]Achievement System
[]Highscores for every gamemode
[]Dedicated development team
[]Hunter
[]Boss Pets
[]Resizable and Fullscreen Client
[]Multiple Settings to change your experience
[]Profile System for the client saving your characters
[]Teamspeak Client
[]Community & Staff hosted events
[]Extremely community orientated
[]Proper mob (NPC) mechanics
[]Smooth and solid gameplay
[]Player protection system
[]Free for all minigame
[]Bounty hunter[/ul]
